t: What does paperback book mean on Flipkart and Amazon? I understand the difference between an e-book and a hard copy. Will paperback simply be the same as the one that I might buy at any regular store? - Quora
s: Answer (1 of 10): Paperback books are those that have a flexible but stiffer-than-paper cover. It's generally confused with hard bound. Hard bound books are those that have non-flexible covers. Yes, it will be the same as the one you might buy at a book store.
